users and roles." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">with grant option</entry><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_WITH_ADMIN_OPTIONs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="with admin option" tooltip="This option is only valid for system priviliges. Specify WITH ADMIN OPTION to enable the grantee to: Grant the role to another user or role, unless the role is a GLOBAL role Revoke the role from another user or role Alter the role to change the authorization needed to access it Drop the role" alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">with admin option</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_WITH_ADMIN_OPTIONs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">This option is only valid for system priviliges. Specify WITH ADMIN OPTION to enable the grantee to: Grant the role to another user or role, unless the role is a GLOBAL role Revoke the role from another user or role Alter the role to change the authorization needed to access it Drop the role</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup></readpanel></dialog>
